attributes.review: You took away the app well all loved, the app that made us aware of our surroundings, that app that taught us things that school didnâ€™t, the app that brought us joy, than app that we all loved!! We trolled you at your rally and we will continue to troll you as long as you are president!!! You are not banning it for â€œchina stealing our informationâ€ they probably already have it whether we like it or not!! Also why the heck would we care our generation is the internet!! Our lives are all on the internet!!!  You are banning it because you feel threatened by us because you know that we are the generation that changes the world!! YOU CAN NOT STOP US!!! You take away our app, We will take away yours!! You can not win this fight!!! WE ARE THE GENERATION WHO CHANGES THE WORLD!!! You push we push back 10x as hard!!!! GIVE US OUR APP BACK!!!!! My pastor was said that he is trying to influence a generation that will influence the world!  It is now in your hands to decide if you want your influence on us to be positive or negative!!! Kids that once had nothing, now have the money and resources to start new lives, to escape from abusive parents, get out of toxic relationships, and so much more all because TikTok!! We are one community and we will not be silenced!! I Pray that you find it in your heart to not ban this beautiful app! This app brings joy to over 1 billion people!
